rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with storage for shoes and coats. Features a sloped pathway for easy access.
Open concept living room, well-lit with large windows oriented towards the northeast as per Vastu recommendations.
Modern kitchen located in the southeast for auspicious energy flow. Wheelchair accessible kitchen island and ample counter space.
Adjacent to the living room, with a large dining table that seats 12 people comfortably.
Spacious master bedroom located in the southwest for rest and privacy. Features an attached bathroom and ample wardrobe space.
Located in the north-east quadrant, providing a quiet and serene environment suitable for guests.
Child's bedroom with ample storage, located in the west quadrant.
Another child or guest room, also accessible by wheelchair and situated in a quiet area of the house.
A dedicated study space facing east for maximum natural light, ideal for reading and studying.
Wheelchair accessible with ample storage and a large shower area.

openings.description: Wide staircase designed for wheelchair accessibility, leading up to a spacious terrace.
